actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of March 4, 1909, as amended, to obtain information for agricultural estimates from county extension agents.

summary.text: Provides that the monthly crop report shall be gathered as far as practicable from practical farmers and from county extension agents engaged in cooperative agricultural extension work. (Amends 7 U.S.C. 411 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of March 4, 1909, as amended, to obtain information for agricultural estimates from county extension agents.
